description:
Everyone loves food, as it’s deeply intertwined with nearly every culture. However, there’s a line that humans were never intended to cross and San Francisco fat expert Virgie Tovar crossed it a long time ago.

Tovar, who is dubbed as an expert on all things related to fatness, claims she despises “the thin is in trend” and is combating that by obsessing even more about food, despite being next up for her own TLC show.

San Francisco Weight Czar Virgie Tovar: "My way of resisting? Eating food." pic.twitter.com/rQ9vEI1Vgq
— M101 News (@M101NewsOrg) March 28,
title: Remember San Fran's "fat positivity" czar? She's sharing her unique way to resist Trump, and, of course, it involves food

description:
The Danish Prime Minister is not happy JD Vance is headed to Greenland. Today’s show breaks down why the Greenland situation matters.

According to Reuters:

The United States is exerting "unacceptable pressure" on Greenland, Denmark's Prime Minister Mette Frederiksen said on Tuesday, ahead of an unsolicited visit by a high-profile U.S. delegation to the semi-autonomous Danish territory this week.

The visit to an American military base will include U.S. Vice President JD Vance, his wife Usha Vance, White House National Security
title: Watch: JD Vance initiates Trump's Greenland takeover, here's why it's CRUCIAL for America

description:
According to Tim Walz, the problem with the 2024 election was not that they were too woke but not enough. And only, if only, they pushed just a little bit more on illegal DEI mandates, and just a little bit more at destroying women’s rights, then maybe, just maybe, they would have won.

This is why he is taking the election results not to check himself before he wrecks himself but to triple down and push harder than ever before.

NEW: Tim Walz says Democrats are losing elections because they’re not pushing hard enough in favor of DEI, wokeism, and allowing illegal immigration.

Wow, this guy is brilliant and totally right. He should run in 2028.

“We let them define the issue on immigration. We let them… pic.twitter.c
title: Tim Walz hasn't learned any 2024 lessons, demands MORE wokeness, DEI, and illegal immigration

description:
The Danish PM is butthurt Vice President JD Vance is headed to Greenland, Trump may be causing fewer foreigners to travel to America (good?), Ezra Klein mistakenly red pills Jon Stewart after explaining how inefficient the government is, behind the scenes from the show and a whole lot more!

JON STEWART RED-PILLED?

  • Live: Biden signs Infrastructure Investment and Jobs Act
title: Sources: Did Ezra Klein Red Pill Jon Stewart?

description:
The deity or deities of content have smiled down upon us this day.

Even more ridiculous than unhinged leftists vandalizing Teslas over lies Democrats and the media (but I repeat myself) told them about Elon Musk is that some of them STILL don't realize that Cousin Elon's cars film everything around them. You are instantaneously caught on film. The more you stand out, the easier it is for local authorities to catch you.

Like, say, and this is me just spitballing off the top of my head, if you are 5'2" and weigh FOUR HUNDRED AND FIFTY POUNDS.

And you need a motorized go-kart to get around.

Check out my dude here. I advise you not to be drinking while you do. I was, and the coffee that squirt out of my nose didn't feel pleasant.

UPDATE: 449-pound Astr
title: Morbidly obese progressive goes on spree crashing mobility scooter into Teslas, but he can't outrun justice

description:
There is a reason why Americans are reacting positively to how fast the Trump Administration is working. Compared to how slow the People Who Controlled Joe Biden and their Democrat party worked, to the point that nothing got done, it's a nice change of pace. The look on Jon Stewart's face as Ezra Klein explains the layer on layer on layer of regulations Democrats voted on to do anything speaks volumes.

This is from Jon Stewart's podcast, which I still dig, even as The Daily Show has become fan-fiction for low-information progressives who think everyone who disagrees with them is a racist, sexist, homophobe. The same progressives who don't realize the anti-billionaire talking points they repeat are written by a different group of billi
title: "Oh. My. F***ing. God": Check out Jon Stewart as he's exposed to just how incompetent Democrats were under Joe Biden
